title: Gianfrancesco Angelini
text:
Mind, space, life, love. It’s all about neurons.
Hi! I’m a passionate senior software developer and devops professional with a deep interest in intelligence (bio or artifical). Currently, I’m pursuing a PhD in AI to expand my knowledge in this rapidly-evolving field. With extensive experience in designing and developing complex software systems, I’m a reliable and efficient team player. I’m always eager to take on new ambitious challenges to enhance my skills and contribute to the success of any project. Feel free to contact me and have a chat
